text: As of September 2016, the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) lists 24 extinct species, 17 possibly extinct species, and two extinct in the wild species of reptile. ==Turtles and tortoises== Extinct species Extinct in the wild species *Pinzon giant tortoise (Chelonoidis duncanensis) *Black softshell turtle (Nilssonia nigricans) ==Lizards== Extinct species Possibly extinct species ==Snakes== Extinct species Possibly extinct species == See also == * List of least concern reptiles * List of near threatened reptiles * List of vulnerable reptiles * List of endangered reptiles * List of critically endangered reptiles * List of data deficient reptiles == References == *Reptiles Recently extinct reptiles Recently extinct reptiles
title: List of recently extinct reptiles
